title: George Carlin Remembered - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/8/18
itunes:title: George Carlin Remembered - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/8/18
description:
George Carlin's daughter, Kelly Carlin, joins Ian Punnett and discusses her father's historic case against the Supreme Court over his Seven Dirty Words routine.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
